title: Enchanting Emerald and Pearl Jhumkas - Traditional Elegance
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design featuring intricate filigree work. The pear-shaped Emerald adds a touch of regal charm. Finished with delicate pearl droplets for a graceful sway. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting sheen.
occasions: or any grand occasion. Also suitable for evening wear
adding a touch of traditional glamour.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The radiant emerald and lustrous pearls offer a rich, elegant look. Light-weight and comfortable to wear for extended periods. Represents wealth and prosperity, making it an auspicious choice for special occasions.
